about_the_game:
CONTENT
Does NOT include any table and customization unlocks.

This DLC unlocks Campaign mode.

DESCRIPTION
Campaign mode offers you a never-before-seen pinball experience with RPG elements.

The Campaign Mode includes more than 150 different levels spread out among the Solid State and EM tables. You do not need to own any DLC to play the campaign mode.

  • Earn more coins by completing tasks and levels. These coins can be spent on upgrades.
  • 7 upgradeable pinball parts (Battery, Plunger, Flipper Length, Ball Size, Time, Multiball, Nudge, Task).
  • The main goal is to complete all levels and unlock the secret treasure chest table!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or SteamOS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: Zaccaria Pinball - Campaign Mode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Campaign mode offers you a never seen pinball experience with RPG elements.
